author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: Grandine also should be ready for Thursday release.

author: timbeiko
content:
Thank you to all the teams who shared their retrospectives on EthMagicians so far ğŸ™  

While there are still some teams' perspectives missing, I tried to synthesize the different proposals into tentative action items: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/pectra-retrospective/22637/27

It would be ideal if we could get everyone's input in the next week or so (testnet releases obviously take priority over this ğŸ˜›) so that we can get to agreement on next steps by the time we're putting out mainnet Pectra releases.
